item.title: Version 1.0.6+54
item.description: 1.0.6+54: Fixing login/logout. Now it should try to load your local data instead of fetching it all over again if you logout and into an account you've looked at before. Also fixed issue with guns not showing up after reloading the app in the performance view (WIP).

item.title: Version 1.0.6+54
item.description: 1.0.6+54: Fixing login/logout. Now it should try to load your local data instead of fetching it all over again if you logout and into an account you've looked at before. Also fixed issue with guns not showing up after reloading the app in the performance view (WIP).
